title: Photograph, "Album: Faucet", 1929–40
description:
Recto: The present photograph features both an image and mirror image of the object, a hot-and-cold-single-spout water faucet with a center soap dish designed for mounting on a back splash behind a sink basin.

Verso: Notes in Jensen's handwriting in ink specify 1929 - [indecipherable].........Int[ernational]. Nickel Co. (type is standard today)

It has not been determined whether the present object was designed by Jensen.

tombstone.epitaph:
Photograph, "Album: Faucet", 1929–40.
1929–40. 7.2 x 15.3 cm (2 7/8 x 6 in.). Gift of Ellen Gustav Jensen. 1956-47-84-e.
